subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Pat Hurst, clad in lime green from her polo shirt and shorts down to her shoelaces, shot a five-under 67 to tie for the best first-day score with Inbee Park of South Korea at the Longs Drugs Challenge in Danville, Calif. Lorena Ochoa was among seven others two strokes back after the first 18 holes.
